candidates.name: Dorjee Tseten
candidates.briefBio: Dorjee Tseten is a member of Tibetan Parliament-in-Exile, a keen strategist and campaigner for Tibet. Dorjee served as the Executive Director of Students for a Free Tibet, International head office at New York from 2017 to 2022. Traveling to more than fifteen countries to facilitate training, deliver talks, and organize campaigns, Dorjee has trained hundreds of students and youth activists to take nonviolent action for Tibet. Dorjee has made major contributions in developing a strong global network among Tibetans, Hong Kongers, Taiwanese, Uyghurs, Southern Mongolians and Chinese dissidents to discuss and develop strategies for democracy, freedom and self determination.
